welcomeMessage: Your central hub for managing clients and servers. Streamline your operations and get a clear overview of your IPTV network.
configureServersMessage: Use our AI-powered tool to validate server parameters for optimal performance.
quickManagementMessage: Quickly access client and server management pages.
viewAndManageClients: View and manage all your clients
clientManagementDescription: View, add, edit, and manage your clients.
searchClientPlaceholder: Search by name, phone or nickname...
name: Name
editClientDescription: Update the details for this client.
registerNewClientDescription: Fill in the form to add a new client to the system.
deleteClientWarning: Do you really want to delete the client
deleteServerWarning: Do you really want to delete the server
deletePlanWarning: Do you really want to delete the plan
serverParameterValidatorDescription: Use our AI tool to validate your server parameters for optimal performance.
howItWorksDescription: Paste your server configuration as a JSON object, select the content type, and our AI will provide a validation report with recommendations.
configurationValidatorDescription: Enter your parameters below to get a validation report.
validationReportMessage: The validation report from the AI will appear here once you submit the configuration.
settingsDescription: Manage your application preferences and settings.
appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of the application.
serverOfflineAlertsDescription: Receive an email when a server goes offline.
clientExpiryWarningsDescription: Get notified 7 days before a client's subscription expires.
weeklySummaryDescription: Receive a weekly summary report via email.
languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application.
editServerDescription: Update the details for this server.
panelCreditStockDescription: Total credits available on this panel.
stockManagementDescription: Manage credit stock for all your panels.
creditBalanceDescription: View and manage the credit balance for each panel.
newServerSuccess: The new server has been registered successfully.
newClientRegisteredSuccess: The new client has been successfully registered.
nameMustBeAtLeast2: Name must be at least 2 characters.
dueDateIsRequired: Due date must be between 1 and 31.
creditStockIsRequired: Credit stock must be a positive number.
choosePaymentMethod: Choose the payment method for panel credits
responsibleNamePlaceholder: Name of the person responsible for the panel
noSubServers: No servers have been added yet. Fill out the form above to get started.
noSubServersMessage: No servers registered for this panel.
noServersFoundMessage: There are no servers matching your search. Try adjusting your filters or register a new one.
reviewRegistrationDescription: Please review the details below before confirming.
nameValidation: Name must be at least 2 characters.
phoneRequired: At least one phone number is required.
addTestToClientDescription: Search for a client and fill in the test details.
durationPositive: Duration must be a positive number.
durationUnitRequired: You must select a unit (hours or days).
selectClientPrompt: Search for a client to start.
selectClientPromptDescription: Once a client is selected, you can manage their subscriptions and applications.
atLeastOnePlanRequired: At least one plan must be added.
addPlanDescription: Add a subscription plan for the selected client.
addMoreServerDescription: Do you want to add another server to this panel?
fillAllFieldsWarning: Please fill in all required fields
fillAllSubServerFields: Please fill in all sub-server fields before adding it to the list.
managePhonesDescription: Add, edit, or remove phone numbers.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number before saving.
clickInsertToAddPhone: Click 'Insert' to add the number to the list before saving.
clientIdManualPlaceholder: Enter the ID generated by the panel
screensToHirePlaceholder: Enter the number of hired screens
addApplicationDescription: Manage the applications associated with the client's subscription.
noScreensOrClient: No screens in the plan or no client selected.
addAtLeastOnePlan: You must add at least one subscription plan.
fillAllApplications: You must configure at least one application.
clientIdRequired: The Client ID is required to activate the subscription.
clientIdRequiredInForm: The client ID is required and must be filled in the client's edit form.
telas contratadas. Adicione os dados de: screens contracted. Add the data for each screen before proceeding.
allScreensFilled: All available screens have been filled.
awaitingIdSave: Awaiting ID to be saved to run comparison...
newSubscriptionSuccess: The subscription has been activated successfully!
clientIdSavedMessage: The ID {id} has been assigned to client {name}.
clientIdAlreadySaved: This Client ID has already been saved.
allAppsConfigured: All applications for the contracted plans have already been configured.
pendingScreensWarning: There are {count} pending screens to be configured. Go to the 'Subscription Plans' tab to manage.
attentionClientHasSubscription: Attention! This client already has an active subscription.
planDetailsDescription: Here are the details of the selected subscription plan.
noPendenciesFound: No pendencies found for this plan.
editPlanDescription: Make the desired changes to the subscription plan.
appAlreadyActivated: Is this application already activated on the client's device?
paymentMethodFirst: Please select a payment method first!
pendingAppsWarning: Client has pending screens to configure.
noTestsInProgress: There are no tests in progress at the moment.
pendingActivationDescription: This client's subscription is not yet active. Fill in all the necessary information on the tabs below and click 'Activate Subscription' to complete the process.
dashboardSettingsDescription: Customize settings for your main dashboard.
expirationWarningDescription: Define the number of days in advance to be warned about expiring subscriptions.
reportsDescription: Export data and insights about your clients and servers.
selectReportsDescription: Select the reports you want to generate.
generatedReportDescription: Here are the reports you requested. You can print this view or save it as a PDF.
noDataForReport: No data available for this report.
dataVerificationDescription: Click the button below to see the raw data being used to generate the report, as it is saved in the browser session.
viewAndManageTransactions: View and manage all credit transactions for this panel.
reversalConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reverse this purchase of {credits} credits, valued at {value}? This action cannot be undone.
manualAdjustmentDescription: Enter a positive value to add credits or a negative value to remove. This is for corrections or manual bonuses.
adjustmentQuantityDescription: Use negative numbers to remove credits.
utilitiesDescription: A collection of tools to help you with your daily tasks.
notepadDescription: Use this space to save quick notes, greeting messages, or any text you need to have on hand.
noNotesYetDescription: Click the button above to create your first note.
createNoteDescription: Write your note and choose a color for the card.
textCopiedSuccess: The note content has been copied to the clipboard.
deleteNoteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.
